channel.title: Rapid Spanning Tree (RSTP) - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: 2.0 Network Access 2.4 Configure and verify (Layer 2/Layer 3) EtherChannel (LACP) 2.5 Describe the need for and basic operations of Rapid PVST+ Spanning Tree Protocol and identify basic operations 2.5.a Root port, root bridge (primary/secondary), and other port names 2.5.b Port states (forwarding/blocking) 2.5.c PortFast benefits Most network engineers make the distribution layer switches be the root. STP Modes and Standards Three options to configure on the spanning-tree mode command, which tells the switch which type of STP to use
